divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 9:15 and I was looking up at the sky when I noticed a real bright Star like light that I knew wasn't there from before then it started to slowly move and was bright as can be it's so strange on what they do they come out of no where and they stand in one place and as your eye's are in tuned onto them it's like they know you are looking and they start to move like to what I could see they are floating through air and they get dimmer and dimmer as you are watching them this light was heading North and seen in the same spot to were I've seen it before then a couple of minutes after seeing it a second one under the big dipper appeared and did the same thing I know what I'm seeing and what ever they are I know deep with in my mind it's not plane's or Star's they just show up out of no where they kind of look like a flair type light but moving so slow and fading away as if they don't want to be seen My friend from Ohio had told me to report everyone that I see and I'm going to start reporting his sightings as well from what he's been seeing off of East Lake Ohio, we keep in contact due to what we are seeing I live on a Hill In Pa, and I have a clear shot of the sky I don't see them every night but gite often and I don't chose to look for UFO's but they are making their self's known
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Shamokin
There were no other sightings in Shamokin on or around September 8th 2008
Summary: I was out on my front Porch when I noticed Star's that looked Brighter then normel
